item.description:
Let's go help support a great cause and listen to 2 awesome bands!

 

UPDATE: The tickets are selling fast they only have approx 45 left, and IF they do sell out then they won't be selling any at the door.  Don't be left out of this great event contact Gina today to get your ticket.

This is a fundraiser to help raise money for Breast Cancer Research. The Avon Walk for Breast Cancer is a huge event, let's go help support this team as they raise money for the walk. 

The money that is raised at this event and the money that is raised for them to do the walk will all go to research!     

Bands: Don't Call Me Shirley and The Lee Hawkins Band. 

There will be dancing, food, raffles and of course tons of fun.

 

To purchase your ticket contact: Gina Paglia at ginadavis14@comcast.net and make sure you tell her you are with "The MEETUP group".

Cost: $25.00 (make your check payable to Avon Walk for Cancer).

You will want to get your ticket soon, they have already sold 1/2 of the tickets, and they are not sure if they will sell any at the door! 

So come on out have some fun, help support a great cause and dance the night away with these 2 awesome bands. 

 

Please remember that if you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, the meetup phone number is: 978-304-2811.

Is it time for you to pay your dues?  Please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer” You can pay your dues at any event.  Thank you!

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: Come on in and find the Meetup table(s).
item.name: IN IT TO END IT!! Fundraiser....
